channel.title: MW3 vs BF3
channel.description:
I have come to a realization that you can't compare these two games, as they are of different category. Call of Duty has be come a 'Unreal Tournament' like arcade, fast paced first-person shooter(and a bad one at that) and BF3 is a realistic-action like military fps. Although if compared due to facts Battlefield wins, I don't understand why CoD fans have yet to realize that the game is the same. TBH I think it's just ignorance, there is a difference between being a dedicated fan and being an arrogant and ignorant pigeon. I could understand a little more if CoD was actually worked on and they tried to improve it, but all they are doing is "Copy, Paste, and Relabel w/ a new skin." I know what I am talking about, I used to be a CoD fan, I've been there since CoD1, 2, 3, 4, and I was even in the CoD 4 beta, I was hooked on the game, and I liked WaW, but any pigeon could see that CoD 4 and MW2 are the same with very few tweaks or improvements. Also, they don't make betas anymore because they know that it's the same game as last time, so why release a beta when they could give you a the same glitchy game on day one. I only play it because my brothers and friends play it, so it's one of the few ways I stay in contact with them. I am very good at CoD so i'm not one of those people who say they don't like a game because they suck at it. I just want CoD gamers to admit that there are better games out there and that CoD isn't the only FPS there is, is that too much to ask.
So, please tell me what makes you think CoD is so much better than other FPS's like Medal of Honor, Battlefield, Halo, Crysis.

item.title: MW3 vs BF3
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
k3nny1550:

What I want to know is why the menus in games are getting so completely unreadable at 480i. All of the new HD development standards mean us SD gamers are getting shafted. Take Dead Space’s HUD for example: on the 360 it’s nearly impossible to read anything in it. Many other games are sadly taking this route also.

Banjo-Kazooie: Nuts & Bolts had this problem too. The text was even too small for an HD TV. Well, at least until they patched it, because there’s a minute amount of VO, and the rest of the dialog is contained in text bubbles. I like my text in large print so I can make out what I’m supposed to do.

Interestingly enough, the fine print in menus didn’t start with this generation, because I remember quite a few titles on the GCN had this problem. I don’t know if it was because the 'Cube had 480p support, but I never noticed it on either of Sony’s or Microsoft’s platforms.

Speaking of which, have you guys noticed that component cables for the GCN cost $100+ on Amazon? Apparently, they’re quite rare considering only Nintendo manufactured them for a short amount of time.

Read full topic

item.title: MW3 vs BF3
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Zuul:

sure. 481p should be high-def. why don’t we all just start splitting hairs and see how fucking far we can go
or; just use the standard 480, 720, 1080, 1200…

What I want to know is why the menus in games are getting so completely unreadable at 480i. All of the new HD development standards mean us SD gamers are getting shafted. Take Dead Space’s HUD for example: on the 360 it’s nearly impossible to read anything in it. Many other games are sadly taking this route also. I realize HDTVs are getting more and more widespread but I’m guessing the majority of TV owners are still in SD, hence why the Wii could get away with 480p and still sell millions of units. (Then again, this is Nintendo we’re talking about here, who could sell invisible ink to a counterfeiter.)

Read full topic

item.title: MW3 vs BF3
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dias:

It’s out, but only in Russia. (I think) A friend of mine pirated it with an English patch & tells me it’s absolute crap, which is sad because we loved Postal 2 so much back in the day.

It’s out, but not officially on steam. It’s still going through some kind of approval I think.

But they have the activation keys for sale which you can use in steam and DL it.

As for quality, it all seems up for grabs now. There’s talk of a cataclysmic patch coming out that could heal all the holes in the game… but idk. From what I’ve seen it looks like dumb fun. Excruciatingly unpolished dumb fun.

Read full topic

item.title: MW3 vs BF3
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Ranzua:

How about we change this to Mw3 vs Bf3 vs POSTAL 3!!!

The Batte of the 3’s…
Yeah I just pumped this thread with a shotgun, kicked it repeatedly, tazed it, lit it on fire with gasoline, decapitated it with a shovel, threw an angry cat at it, pepper sprayed it, pee’d on it, and rode off on my segway

Too bad you didn’t realize your segway was a quicksand pit with the word [COLOR=‘Red’]BAN at the bottom, and you’re already starting to sink.

item.title: MW3 vs BF3
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

Quake III engine, you have been good to us. Then bad to us. Now you just need to go away.

Tell that to the people who complain whenever a game isn’t at least 720p, saying it isn’t HD. In reality, anything higher than 640x480 is HD.

That said, I agree with Maxey. More resolution = better. I wouldn’t go to the extremes that he would, but still

anything under 720p is not hd

480p is digital broadcasting made by our beloved cabledistributors…or benefactors

Read full topic
